content:
Yes, here are a few more vegan and vegetarian restaurants in Madrid that you may enjoy:

1. Eco Centro Ecologico: This vegetarian restaurant offers a diverse menu of plant-based dishes, and their seitan with mushroom sauce and vegan cheesecake are amazing. 2. El Rincón del Segoviano: This restaurant has a vegetarian and vegan menu, with their lentil stew and vegan burger being highly recommended. 3. Pizzi & Dixie: Although they are famous for their pizza, they offer vegan and vegetarian options. Their veggie burger and vegan nutella pizza are popular choices. 4. B13 Vegan Food: This is a vegan fast food restaurant that is known for its vegan burgers and bowls. I hope these suggestions are helpful, and you find another great vegetarian or vegan restaurant to try!
